abstract: Allowing the two mortgage agencies to keep their earnings would still leave their government bailout unpaid, but it would be a smart first step.
snippet: Allowing the two mortgage agencies to keep their earnings would still leave their government bailout unpaid, but it would be a smart first step.
lead_paragraph: The election has resurrected the fiasco of how to fix Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac. Shares of the two bailed-out mortgage agencies have rocketed over the last two weeks on hopes that the Trump administration might end government oversight. Big political roadblocks remain, though.

headline.main: Freeing Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
